feed.title: Azure Architecture Center
feed.subtitle: Updated articles for Azure Architecture Center

entry.title: Implement SMA OpCon in Azure
entry.summary: Learn how to use SMA Technologies OpCon in a Kubernetes configuration to automate Azure and on-premises workloads that run on various servers across an enterprise.

entry.title: Cross-Region Resiliency for SQL TDE with Azure Key Vault Managed HSM
entry.summary: This solution describes a secure and resilient deployment pattern for Azure SQL Managed Instance. It highlights how Azure Key Vault Managed HSM stores customer-managed TDE protector keys.

entry.title: Basic Azure AI Foundry Chat Reference Architecture
entry.summary: Establish foundational knowledge for how to build and deploy enterprise chat applications by using Azure AI Foundry and Azure App Service.

entry.title: Choose a Stream Processing Technology
entry.summary: Compare options for real-time message stream processing in Azure, with key selection criteria and a capability matrix.

entry.title: Scale out an Azure IoT Hub-based solution to support millions of devices
entry.summary: Learn how to scale out your Azure IoT Hub-based solution to support millions of devices.

entry.title: IoT Hub-based Multitenant Solution Architectural Approaches
entry.summary: Learn about architectural approaches for Azure IoT Hub-based multitenant solutions to build scalable, secure, and efficient solutions.

entry.title: Overview of Microsoft Machine Learning Products and Technologies
entry.summary: Compare options for building, deploying, and managing your machine learning models. Decide which Microsoft products to choose for your solution.

entry.title: Choose an Azure service for vector search
entry.summary: Learn how to use this information to decide which Azure service for vector search best suits your application.

entry.title: Multiple forests with AD DS and Microsoft Entra ID
entry.summary: This article describes an example workload of creating multiple Active Directory forests by using Azure Virtual Desktop.

entry.title: Identity architecture design
entry.summary: Control access to your apps and data by designing and implementing an identity solution. See resources with guidelines, best practices, and recommendations.

entry.summary: Learn how Microsoft Entra ID can help secure and protect Amazon Web Services (AWS) identity management and account access. Discover Microsoft security solutions.

entry.title: Integrate on-premises AD domains with Microsoft Entra ID
entry.summary: Learn how to implement a secure hybrid network architecture that integrates on-premises Active Directory domains with Microsoft Entra ID.

entry.title: Microsoft Sentinel automated responses
entry.summary: Use Microsoft Sentinel playbooks to generate automated responses and deliver intelligent security analytics for enterprises.

entry.title: Cloud Design Patterns
entry.summary: Learn about design patterns for building reliable, scalable, and more secure applications in the cloud with examples based on Microsoft Azure.

entry.title: Migrate IBM System i (AS/400) to Azure by Using Infinite i
entry.summary: Use Infinite i to easily migrate your IBM System i (AS/400) workloads to Azure. You can lower costs, improve performance, improve availability, and modernize.

entry.title: Architectural considerations for identity in a multitenant solution
entry.summary: This article describes the considerations for managing identities in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Backends for Frontends Pattern
entry.summary: Explore the Backends for Frontends pattern, which creates separate backend services for consumption by specific frontend applications or interfaces.

entry.title: Extend Mainframes to Digital Channels by Using Standards-Based REST APIs
entry.summary: Learn how the digital transformation architecture extends mainframe applications to Azure without disruptions or modifications to existing applications.

entry.title: Design to Support Foundation Model Life Cycles
entry.summary: Learn about how to manage both new model versions and retired model versions in your generative AI application infrastructure.

entry.title: Use Azure Front Door in a Multitenant Solution
entry.summary: Learn about the key features of Azure Front Door that enhance reliability, scalability, and security when working in multitenant solutions.

entry.title: SaaS and Multitenant Solution Architecture
entry.summary: This guide provides an overview of the architectural content for software as a service (SaaS), startups, and multitenancy and guidance about how to architect multitenant solutions on Azure.

entry.summary: This article describes the approaches for managing identities in a multitenant solution.

entry.title: Architectural Approaches for Compute in Multitenant Solutions
entry.summary: Learn about approaches to support multitenancy for compute components, including scaling strategies, isolation models, and cost-efficient shared resources.

entry.title: Considerations for Using Azure Container Apps in a Multitenant Solution
entry.summary: Learn about Azure Container Apps features that are useful in multitenant systems, including scalability, isolation, and resource management. Get links to extra guidance.

entry.title: Azure Service Bus Considerations for Multitenancy
entry.summary: This article describes the features of Azure Service Bus that are useful in multitenant systems. It provides links to guidance for how to use Service Bus in a multitenant solution.

entry.summary: Extend existing MLOps investments to include generative AI operations. Learn where you can apply existing investments and where you need to extend those investments.

entry.summary: Establish foundational knowledge for how to build and deploy enterprise chat applications by using Azure AI Foundry and Azure App Service.

entry.summary: Learn about several options for moving, converting, transforming, and storing mainframe and midrange file system data on-premises and in Azure.

entry.summary: Learn more about Azure options for orchestrating, storing, building, deploying, and using custom document processing models.

entry.summary: Evaluate analytical data store options for big data by reviewing key selection criteria and a capability matrix to compare database models and features.

entry.summary: Build a serverless microservices solution on Azure Container Apps using Distributed Application Runtime (Dapr) and Kubernetes Event-Driven Autoscaling (KEDA).

entry.summary: Review autoscaling guidance. Autoscaling is the process of dynamically allocating resources to match performance requirements.

entry.summary: Multitenancy lets you serve multiple tenants in an Azure-hosted solution. Use this checklist to evaluate your multitenancy needs and architecture.

entry.summary: Learn how to use Oracle ZDM and Azure networking to migrate an Oracle database to Oracle Database@Azure Exadata Database Service.

entry.summary: Learn about Apache Kafka and about ways to migrate a Kafka implementation to Azure by using Azure services like HDInsight and Event Hubs.

entry.summary: This article provides a set of links and resources for architects and developers of multitenant solutions.

entry.summary: Learn best practices for moving an IoT Hub-based solution to production, including deployment stamps, transient fault handling, and zero-touch provisioning.

entry.summary: This article outlines Azure SQL Database features for designing a multitenant system. It provides guidance and examples for using Azure SQL in a multitenant solution.

entry.summary: Learn how to use the durable functions feature of Azure Functions as an automated document processing pipeline to classify documents by type.

entry.summary: Review how to choose an encoding format for asynchronous messaging. Explore encoding format considerations and choices for encoding formats.

entry.summary: Evaluate big data analytics technology options for Azure. Use key selection criteria and a capability matrix to help you choose a data analytics technology.
